title: Shri Hanuman Chalisa and other Mantras by [bantu mistry]
description:
This collection is full of rare and old religious songs which are piously sung by various singers. This collection has really played an important role to lift my life from negative to positive and helped me to reach the heights and above all to become a good human being. Whenever i feel depressed, i just listen to these holy songs and believe me, i get so much power and strength in me and i become full of positive energy, there is great powerfull "Magic" in these Mantras!

I recite Hanuman Chalisa and Gayatri Chalisa before sleeping at night! it gives me emmense amount of energy!

Collection : Shree Hanuman Chalisa and Shree Gayatri Chalisa + Various other Mantras
Singers : Hariharan, Anuradha Pauwal, Sadhna Sargam, Gulshan Kumar, Ishwardan Gadhvi, Lata Mangeshkar, M.S.Subbalakshmi, Sanskar tv Rameshbhai, Shankar Mahadevan, Shravan, Sneha, Aparna, Armaan, Udit Narayan


Information

Level: MPEG 1 Layer III
Frequency: 44100Hz
Channels: 2 Stereo
Total Songs: 42 - Tracks
Total Size: 414 MB

All you have to do is, just listen to them as much a s possible and eventually you'd remember them. Understanding the meaning of mantra is not important, if you don't understand this language but chanting it piously is important
